nodes.text: The Room of Morning Mists was a rotunda in the Varykino retreat in the Lake Country of Naboo. It was used as a dining area while the lake retreat was under the ownership of the Naberrie family.

The controversial Naboo poet Omar Berenko wrote some of his most famous works in this room, while staying at Varykino centuries prior to the First Battle of Geonosis. The visionary epic poem, Defense of Naboo, was believed to have been written here.

While staying at Varykino following two assassination attempts on Coruscant, Padmé Amidala and Anakin Skywalker shared dinner in the Room of Morning Mists. They were waited on by Nandi and Teckla, and Anakin displayed his Force powers by using it to casually float a piece of shuura fruit across the table to Padmé.
